programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep36
programme.desc: Shellabyrinth / Helping Hans - Berry runs away from responsibility only to learn a lesson of responsibility, and then totally disregard the lesson learned because being responsible is a trap. / The Mighty Ones meet a multi-tool named Hans, and find uses for his various attachments, while Hans wrestles with his own self-worth.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep70
programme.desc: The Scarlet Panther - When the feared Scarlet Panther comes to town, Puss is forced to give up his boots and must wear laid-back slippers which change his personality

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep17
programme.desc: Rupert and the Giant Sunflower - Rupert is very excited. Mother Nature has given him a special elixir to help his sunflower seeds grow but there's a big surprise to come.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep18
programme.desc: Rupert and the Cuckoo Clock - When Mum's cuckoo clock breaks time stops and Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill freeze in time. Rupert and the Fox Twins have to find a way to get time ticking again

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep19
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Books - When Ping Pong says she is too busy to join a story reading day Raggety magically brings the books to life and they fly to Ping Pong's Pagoda, where they start to tell her their stories.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep20
programme.desc: Rupert and the Mischievous Genie - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Raggety find some magical, musical stepping stones deep in the woods and unwittingly unleash a naughty young genie bent on making mischief.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep19
programme.desc: Where's My Feather Gone? - Jess thinks that Little Bird has dropped a feather as a gift for him to keep and play with so he's very worried when it goes missing. He searches for it and finally he finds it, right in Little Bird's nest, keeping her warm.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep20
programme.desc: Where Have All The Stars Gone? - Jess is having a sleepover and wants to wish on a star with the puppies like Willow has told them to. But they all fall asleep. When he wakes in the morning to find the stars are gone he has to work out why and when they'll be back

programme.title: Olivia Ep39
programme.desc: Olivia Paints A Mural - Olivia is inspired after a visit to the museum with her family, and decides she's going to become a great painter herself. She gets right down to business, painting a portrait of Ian. When she sees a mural painting on a building wall, she wonders if she'll ever find a space big enough for her big ideas!

programme.title: Olivia Ep40
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Ducklings - After a fun day at the park, Olivia and Ian return home with some unexpected visitors a mother duck and her ducklings! The harder Olivia and Ian try to keep he ducks a secret from Mother and Father, the more household mischief they all seem to get into.

programme.title: Olivia Ep41
programme.desc: Olivia The Pet Monitor - Olivia and Francine both volunteer to be classroom pet monitor, so the teacher, Mrs. Hogenmuller, tells them each to explain why they deserve the job. Francine initially wins over the class with the help of her charming cat, Gwendolyn, but when it's revealed that Francine is afraid of the class lizard, everyone is happy for Olivia to take over the job - especially Francine!

programme.title: Olivia Ep42
programme.desc: Olivia Plays Hotel - When school is let out early due to snow, Julian and Francine come over to Olivia's house. Olivia has the perfect game for them Hotel! She transforms her house into a make-believe hotel. But then some strange things start to happen. Does the hotel have ghosts, or is Ian just playing tricks on them?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! . All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep19
programme.desc: Why Hare Hops - You see there was a time when Hare didn't hop. He was one of the speediest animals in Tinga Tinga but none of the other animals wanted to race with him because Hare always won and it was becoming boring. Then one day, slow but clever Tortoise decides to challenge Hare. Hare can't believe his luck, but Tortoise wins and he wins and he wins! When Hare realizes that it's not such fun being on the losing end, Tortoise finally lets Hare hop past the finishing line in first place! Well it's not good to win all the time. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep20
programme.desc: Why Mosquito Buzzes - You see there was time when Mosquito didn't buzz. Mosquito was as quiet as quiet can be and did she like to tell tales. One day Mosquito tells the Monkeys that the sun looks very low in the sky. Maybe it's sad and doesn't want to rise!' worry the Monkeys. Mosquito flits off to spread the news - The sun is never going to rise again!' soon the whole of Tinga Tinga is in complete panic The Sun is never going to rise again!' Of course, the sun does rise again and all is right again in Tinga Tinga. But the animals decide to tie a grass around Mosquito's tail. From that day on Mosquito buzzes and everyone can swot her away rather than listen to her gossipy tales. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep9
programme.desc: Slow Boat to England - Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep29
programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that its time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep16
programme.desc: Dragon - Puss vows to slay a dragon that is terrorizing nearby towns, but when he discovers it's a sickly baby dragon, he decides to bring it back home.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep43
programme.desc: They Might Be Sky Giants / The Grugest Story Ever Told - After getting hit on the head, Eep has a vision and sets out to get the Valley to show how thankful they are; Grug feels like he's the biggest joke in Ahhh Valley, so he asks Thunk to make a buy-o-pic of him to show people just how truly great he is

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep30
programme.desc: Galapagos a Go-Go - When Odlulu uses the Become an Animal Key to transform herself into different animals, she accidentally disrupts the Galapagos Islands animal populations. It's up to Wally, Wenda, Edmund and Hillary to protect the Galapagos from Odlulu's creature chaos.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep17
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Pawston - Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she cant perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesnt break her promise to the town.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko / What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ians lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat's Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep42
programme.desc: Skunked! / Neighborhood Bird Watch - Archibald cant wait to celebrate his Hatch Day with his family inside an impossibly fun theme park. But when Archibald accidentally gets sprayed by a skunk, he must try to get rid of his stank before his special day is ruined. / When Archibald overhears something suspicious about a neighbor, he reports it to his aunts who run the Neighborhood Bird Watch. With Archibald as their new recruit, they attempt to expose the neighbors suspicious shenanigans.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep42
programme.desc: Who Arted? - King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep64
programme.desc: A Rider's Balance - After meeting her riding idols, Pru vows to practice until she's perfect even if it means missing out on a bonfire her best friends are planning.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep3
programme.desc: Harveyween / New Kid on the Block - Lotta has to save her friends while overcoming her fear of "Nighttime Halloween". The girls do their best to make the new kid on the block fall in love with Harvey Street.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep37
programme.desc: Twig Is Dead / Message Slab - Thinking Twig died under wet cement, the Mighty Ones make a statue of Twig and give him a funeral. / A phone falls into the yard while in autoplay mode. Twig and the others think the videos are instructions for living, but Berry feels like no one is listening to her.

programme.desc: Pajuna Serves Spirits - Pajuna attempts to tell fortunes and gets possessed with an evil spirit, out to get revenge on Puss

programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Stacis plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.desc: Family On The Edge - When Dagur comes to Dragon's Edge looking for Heather, Hiccup tries to keep the two siblings apart by teaching Dagur the art of Dragon Riding.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep38
programme.desc: Last Auction Heroes - When the Riders uncover the location of Viggo's Dragon Auction, they must stop him from selling dragons and stealing all the gold in Berk.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep243
programme.desc: School Camp - Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared and all the children end up sleeping in Madame Gazelles tent

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pigs boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep153
programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Spring is Here! - It's getting warmer outside, and the flowers are blooming - that must mean that spring is here! We play an outdoors game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do on the first day of spring.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1001
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers - When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Cap'n Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat.

programme.desc: Charger Visits the Pups - Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Meteor Mayhem / Dance Of Destruction - A meteor is heading for earth and Sir Steel's heroic efforts only make the Deer Squad's job in saving the planet even harder! // A dance competition in the Central Forest turns chaotic when Sir Steel uses his monkey suit to beat Rammy in the final.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Day / Pups Turn on the Lights - Alex loses his back pack on the first day of school! Ryder and the Paw Patrol need to help him find it. // Its Chases birthday and the pups are planning a surprise party. A storm causes the power to go out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup-Formers - Its a hot day and the pups head for the water park but the pool is empty! Paw Patrol to the rescue. // When the animals dont show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Space Invader / Reindeer's Game / Short Kites - After a long day of adventures together, Turtle needs space from Bossy. // Bossy and Turtle get distracted by a video game and lost Roller's backpack. // Bossy and Turtle want to fly a kite but Bossy's room must be clean first.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark / William vs. Wild - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes. // After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet / The Curse of the Pirate Baby - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique. // Bonnie Bones transforms into a baby and it's up to the good pirates to change her back.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep214
programme.desc: The Kitty Cat Caper - Bonnie's cat tricks the crew into thinking he's a good pirate, but then they realize he's actually after their treasure.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep249
programme.desc: The Powercut - One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppas house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zo Zebras house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.desc: Sparkle's Big Rescue - When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep702
programme.desc: Mail Truck Blaze - When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse/Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. // Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Blue Makes a Movie with YOU! - Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Pups and the Lighthouse Boogie / Pups Save Ryder - Mayor Goodway and Alex row out into the bay to get a closer look at a baby whale. But a storm blows the rowboat towards the sea. // Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour / Honey Bear / The Science Pair - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park. // When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend. // Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On / Detective Baby Shark - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor / Sink or Swim - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep201
programme.desc: The Stones of Power - When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitn Calavera!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep214
programme.desc: The Legend of El Ratoncio Prez - The crew must team up with the fabled tooth mouse El Ratoncito Perez to retrieve his stolen cap and satchel from Enrique.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Cave Barbapapas / The Little Monsters - The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1001
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mayor's Assistant - Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant, and builds a theme park! A jealous Humdinger sabotages the rides.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1001
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers - When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Cap'n Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep301
programme.desc: Pups Find a Genie / Pups Save a Tightrope Walker - Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep106
programme.desc: When You Wish Upon a Fish / Shark-Off - Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Blizzard Wizard - When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery / Paddington And The Fossil Hunt - What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure // Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, everyone else seems to be getting lucky except her, can Paddington help?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot? // The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep220
programme.desc: Mystery of the Missing Pies - Mr. Salt's pies keep disappearing.Where did the pies go?! In this very mysterious episode, we're detectives and play Blue's Clues to find the missing pies.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Steel In Space / That's Magic - Sir Steel wants to go to the moon and gets Professor Scratch to convert Steel Towers into a space rocket! // A magician steal the audience away from Rammy's martial arts performance. Peeved, Rammy meddles with his hat and triggers a rabbit invasion.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon - Santi and crew go underwater to stop Escarlata la Pirata before she steals all the Magic Rubies from Giant Clam Reef! // It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Legendary Loot / Yup Day - After finding a map to the Legendary Loot, the Shark family splits up to hunt the treasure down. // Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon / Happy Bestie-versary / The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy. // Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary. // Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1001
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mayor's Assistant - Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant, and builds a theme park! A jealous Humdinger sabotages the rides.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1001
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers - When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Cap'n Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep61
programme.desc: Close the Gate - The Teletubbies accidentally leave the Tiddlytubbies' gate open and some of them escape into Home Dome. The Teletubbies must find them all and then close the gate.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Nose - Dee encourages a friend to say 'nose' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different noses - funny noses, bunny noses, sniffy noses and even snoring noses!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Phoebe's Hotel - As it's rainy, Phoebe decides to play hotel - will the game go as well as she hopes?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Eye Spy - Messy and friends explore the forest with Tweedy. When her eyesight fails, Zim, Zam and Zoom lend a hand.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Dr. Funny Bones - Following advice from Gran, Monty tells Stan a joke to keep his mind preoccupied from a splinter in his finger. This leads him to wonder if laughter really is the best medicine.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Horsey Ride - When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, Socks grabs it! The kids stage a horsey wedding to distract her, with Dad and Uncle Stripe as the horses!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep21
programme.desc: The Days of the Week Badge - After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep30
programme.desc: The Cinema Badge - Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep29
programme.desc: The Difficult Badge - As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Machu Picchu, Peru - A giant grimbot bounces down the valley of Machu Picchu. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Artificial Reef - Xuli finds a shipwreck on a coral reef and learns some glitches don't need to be fixed.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Fruit Bat - Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.desc: Bbq - It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.desc: Andy and The Ethiopian Wolves - When the photos Mr Hammond took of a family of Ethiopian wolves are mysteriously blank, it's up to Andy to save the day.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep13
programme.desc: Midnight Feast - The pirates would love to have a midnight feast even though Captain Captain forbids it. It states in her pirate handbook that a pirates bedtime is 8 o'clock, so a midnight feast is not an option.
